fluxible 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    ploting fluxes for fit evaluation

    flux_plot_lin.Rd

    plots the fluxes and indicates what should be discarded or replaced by zero

    Usage

    flux_plot_lin(
  slopes_df,
  datetime_col = "f_datetime",
  conc_col = "f_conc",
  cut_col = "f_cut",
  fit_col = "f_fit",
  quality_flag_col = "f_quality_flag",
  fluxID_col = "f_fluxID",
  pvalue_col = "f_pvalue",
  rsquared_col = "f_rsquared",
  start_col = "f_start",
  y_text_position = 500
)

    Arguments

    slopes_df

    dataset containing slopes

    datetime_col

    column containing datetime of each concentration measurement

    conc_col

    column containing gas concentration data

    cut_col

    column containing cut factor from the flux_fitting function ("cut" or "keep")

    fit_col

    column containing the modelled fit of the flux

    quality_flag_col

    column containing the flags produced by flux_quality

    fluxID_col

    column containing unique IDs for each flux

    pvalue_col

    column containing the p-value of each flux

    rsquared_col

    column containing the r squared used for the quality assessment

    start_col

    column containing the datetime of the start of each flux

    y_text_position

    position of the text box but will take time depending on the size of the dataset
